product_name: Mountain Hardwear Escala Pack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear Escala Daypack suits every adventure, from campus life to trail hikes. It's sized to fit a woman's anatomy, holds a laptop and has easy-access pockets. Streamlined, padded shoulder straps are shaped to fit women's narrower shoulders; fully padded back panel and fast-wicking air mesh keep you comfortable. Large main compartment features a multipurpose sleeve that fits a 15 in. laptop or a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Easy-access front organization pocket contains a sleeve to hold your tablet, plus a zippered security pocket. Deep side pockets provide easy access to water bottles or power cords. Mountain Hardwear Escala Daypack features front and top grab handles. Adjustable sternum strap holds the pack in place. Stowable ice axe loop can be used to strap extra gear to the outside of pack. Closeout.
